Title: Directs the state comptroller to conduct an audit of monies allocated pursuant to the federal CARES Act and to publish the results of such audit
Summary: Directs the state comptroller to conduct an audit of monies allocated pursuant to the federal CARES Act, including but not limited to monies received by local governments, state agencies, school districts, small businesses, large corporations, and hospitals, and to publish the results of such audit.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the state comptroller to conduct an audit of monies allocated pursuant to the federal CARES Act and to publish the results of such audit; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
